item.title: About
item.description: Hi there I’m Pedro, welcome to my blog ! A little about me: I received my Bachelors of Science degree in computer science from Pierre and Marie Curies University (UPMC), Paris. I currently hold the position of Senior Software Engineer at TOP 5 LTD. I started programming when I was 8 years and I’m still eager to learn and push my limits. Nowadays I’m learning Rust !
